member.name: T:BooruDex2.Models.Rating
member.summary: Represents a level of explicit content of the post.

member.name: F:BooruDex2.Models.Rating.None
member.summary: The post dont have a rating.

member.name: F:BooruDex2.Models.Rating.Safe
member.summary: Safe posts are images that you would not feel guilty looking at openly in public. Pictures of nudes, exposed nipples or pubic hair, cameltoe, or any sort of sexually suggestive pose are NOT safe and belong in questionable. Swimsuits and lingerie are borderline cases; some are safe, some are questionable.

member.name: F:BooruDex2.Models.Rating.Questionable
member.summary: Basically anything that isn't safe or explicit. This is the great middle area, and since it includes unrated posts, you shouldn't really expect anything one way or the other when browsing questionable posts.

member.name: F:BooruDex2.Models.Rating.Explicit
member.summary: Any image where the vagina or penis are exposed and easily visible. This includes depictions of sex, masturbation, or any sort of penetration. Literally NSFW.

member.name: M:BooruDex2.Models.Tag.#ctor(System.UInt32,System.String,BooruDex2.Models.TagType,System.UInt32)
member.param: The number of occurences of the tag.

member.name: P:BooruDex2.Models.Tag.ID
member.summary: Gets the ID of the tag.

member.name: P:BooruDex2.Models.Tag.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the tag.

member.name: P:BooruDex2.Models.Tag.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of the tag.

member.name: P:BooruDex2.Models.Tag.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of occurences of the tag.

member.name: M:BooruDex2.Models.TagRelated.#ctor(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.param: The number of occurences of the tag.

member.name: P:BooruDex2.Models.TagRelated.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the tag.

member.name: P:BooruDex2.Models.TagRelated.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of occurences of the tag.

member.name: T:BooruDex2.Models.TagType
member.summary: Tag is keywords you can use to describe posts.

member.name: F:BooruDex2.Models.TagType.Artist
member.summary: Artist tags identify the tag as the artist. This doesn't mean the artist of the original copyrighted artwork.

member.name: F:BooruDex2.Models.TagType.Character
member.summary: Character tags identify the tag as a character.

member.name: F:BooruDex2.Models.TagType.Copyright
member.summary: The copyright type indicates the tag represents an anime, a game, a novel, or some sort of copyrighted setting. Otherwise they work identically to character and artist tags.

member.name: F:BooruDex2.Models.TagType.General
member.summary: General tags are used for everything else. General tags should objectively describe the contents of the post.

member.name: F:BooruDex2.Models.TagType.Metadata
member.summary: Meta tags generally describe things beyond the content of the image itself. Examples include translated, copyright request, duplicate, image sample, and bad id.

member.name: F:BooruDex2.Models.TagType.Faults
member.summary: There's something wrong with the post.

member.name: F:BooruDex2.Models.TagType.Circle
member.summary: Circle tags are meta-copyrights. Most are artist circles (artist collectives) or studios like key which are in a way also artist circles. Also included are publications like Megami and NyanType. These are used ONLY for official artwork (produced or published by...) unless otherwise stated in the wiki (eg. Nintendo is an exception).

member.name: M:BooruDex2.Models.Wiki.#ctor(System.UInt32,System.String,System.String)
member.param: The ID of the wiki entry.
The date when the wiki entry was created.
The date of the latest update to the wiki entry.
